post.title: First sci hack post
post.text: this hack is awesome .. so very very very awesome
post.blurb: Houston, that may have seemed like a very long final phase. The autotargeting was taking us right into a ... crater, with a large number of big boulders and rocks ... and it required ... flying manually over the rock field to find a reasonably good area. A good rule for rocket experimenters to follow is this: always assume that it will explode.
post.author: stuart
